TopicTitle: RO compatibility patches for MK2Expansion parts

Articles.Content:
Hey all! 

I'm working on a series of patches to make a variety of aircraft parts compatible with RO, mainly because I love aircraft and I really like the RealFuels system. 

I currently have the majority of the parts of the mk2 expansion done, except for the engines, I will look into that later. They are also not perfectly balanced yet.

Contents: 

 Mk2x RO patches

FAR compatibility patches for the CEDA and Eskandare part packs

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1OlFk_5aZ0LJUVf7JWJA_IDljSN5pb22t/view?usp=drivesdk

To install: 

Make your own folder called Mypatches if you don't have one and extract the contents to that folder. 

 

Some parts have not been added to prevent duplicates, the reactor is also not added because I couldn't get its radiator to work properly.

Hypersonic nosecone rcs works but is kinda "hacked" , no clue what I really did there to be honest

If you encounter any issues please let me know. I plan to add the following mods too:

Mk3expansion

Airplane plus

Retrofuture

C.E.D.A

Eskandare

And

Nice mkseries(cant recall exact name atm)

I might look into Quiztech aero parts too they already have AJE configs so

Edited September 29, 2019 by Cruss
